title: New: Lorde – Team
body:
Teenage New Zealander **Lorde** continues her meteoric rise to fame with new track Team.

Having begun to break the US with recent single _Royals_, **Ella Yelich-O’Connor **is well on her way to worldwide stardom. _Team_ is yet another scarily composed composition, and to draw the most overused cliche out of the book, shows immense maturity, well beyond her modest years. Check out _Team_ below, and we’ll see you on Wednesday if you were lucky enough to get tickets to her debut London show, which sold out in 4 minutes.

_‘I’m kinda over getting told to throw my hands up in the air’_
